description:
Pasha de Cartier Parfum - Timeless Masculine Elegance

Experience the epitome of luxury men's fragrance with the iconic Pasha de Cartier Parfum. This exquisite 100ml masterpiece represents the pinnacle of Cartier's perfumery expertise, delivering an unforgettable aromatic journey that captivates the senses. âœ¨

The Essence of Pasha de Cartier

This Cartier masterpiece is a sophisticated evolution of the classic Pasha fragrance, reimagined as a luxurious parfum concentration for the discerning gentleman. The Pasha de Cartier Parfum embodies strength, refinement, and timeless elegance with its rich aromatic profile. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 100ml
Gender Men
Product Type Parfum
Concentration Parfum (Highest)
Brand Cartier

Scent Profile: A Symphony of Refined Notes

Fragrance Notes
Top Notes Lavender, Mandarin Orange, Mint
Heart Notes Coriander, Rosewood, Anise
Base Notes Sandalwood, Oakmoss, Labdanum, Patchouli

Key Features of Pasha de Cartier Parfum:

  • Premium parfum concentration for exceptional longevity and sillage ðŸ’Ž
  • Sophisticated aromatic-woody composition perfect for the confident man
  • Elegant bottle design inspired by Cartier's iconic luxury heritage
  • Versatile fragrance suitable for both formal occasions and daily wear
  • Part of Cartier's prestigious fragrance collection

The Legacy of Pasha

First introduced in 1992, Pasha de Cartier was inspired by the elegant lifestyle of the Pasha â€“ a high-ranking Ottoman official known for extraordinary wealth and refined taste. The Parfum version elevates this legacy with a more concentrated, luxurious interpretation of the original composition. The fragrance symbolizes power, sophistication, and masculine confidence â€“ qualities that have made it a bestselling fragrance for decades. ðŸŒ¿

Frequently Asked Question

What makes Pasha de Cartier Parfum different from the EDT version?

The Parfum concentration of Pasha de Cartier offers significantly greater longevity and projection compared to the EDT. With approximately 20-30% fragrance oils (versus 5-15% in EDT), this parfum concentration delivers a richer, more complex scent experience with enhanced depth in the woody and aromatic notes. The parfum also showcases more pronounced sandalwood and oakmoss in the dry down, creating a more sophisticated and long-lasting signature on the skin. Perfect for those seeking the ultimate luxury fragrance experience. âœ¨

Discover Pasha de Cartier Parfum, an exquisite 100ml luxury fragrance blending lavender, mandarin, and mint with a powerful base of sandalwood and oakmoss. This premium parfum concentration delivers unparalleled longevity and sillage for the sophisticated modern gentleman.
